subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Hours after cornerback Darrelle Revis said he was “speechless” about trade talk, the Jets’ new general manager, John Idzik, asked him to “give us a chance” to evaluate the entire roster.
snippet: Hours after cornerback Darrelle Revis said he was “speechless” about trade talk, the Jets’ new general manager, John Idzik, asked him to “give us a chance” to evaluate the entire roster.
